column1: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) size (128, 256, 1) capture representing the head of a man aged  of 37 years old, with a sequence weighted in T2 and sagittal section, starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The image notably reveals the presence of: the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4585.2539 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 6197.6074 mm³, the temporal horn of right lateral ventricle of volume 10.5469 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 172.7051 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1510.8398 mm³ and the right hippocampus of volume 100.1953 mm³.

Magnetic resonance image (MRI) size (128, 256, 1) capturing the head of a man aged  of 37 years old, with a sequence weighted in T2 and sagittal section. The specific slice is number 163, counted from the right hemisphere of the skull.
